CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Cultural Development Agency relative to Meridian Heritage Fund?
SRP.A: Stellar Cultural Development Agency is {above} Meridian Heritage Fund in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Heritage Fund relative to Stellar Cultural Development Agency?
SRP.A: Meridian Heritage Fund is {below} Stellar Cultural Development Agency in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cultural event funding?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Cultural Development Agency}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cultural event funding?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Heritage Fund}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Heritage Fund's maximum Cultural Event Funding in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Heritage Fund's maximum Cultural Event Funding is in {1972}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Cultural Development Agency's maximum Cultural Event Funding in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Cultural Development Agency's maximum Cultural Event Funding is in {1976}.

NC.Q: Was the total Cultural Event Funding in 1971 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total cultural event funding in 1971 was {lower} than in 1973.

NC.Q: Was the total Cultural Event Funding in 1976 higher or lower than in 1980?
NC.A: The total cultural event funding in 1976 was {higher} than in 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1974, was the average total Cultural Event Funding higher or lower than between 1972 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total cultural event funding between 1972 and 1974 was {lower} than between 1972 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1975, was the average total Cultural Event Funding higher or lower than between 1973 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total cultural event funding between 1974 and 1975 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1975.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Stellar Cultural Development Agency} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Meridian Heritage Fund and Stellar Cultural Development Agency first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Meridian Heritage Fund and Stellar Cultural Development Agency first exchanged leading positions in {1972}.
